module_ab_router_description: Routes the workflow to different presets in a round-robin fashion. Useful for distributing workloads or performing even variant testing.
tooltip_add_all_presets: Add all presets to the order
tooltip_remove_all_presets: Remove all presets from the order
ab_router_log_routing: A/B Rotator: Routing traffic to workflow '{preset_name}'.
ab_router_error_execution: An error occurred while executing the sub-workflow '{preset_name}'.
module_ab_router_tutorial: Tutorial for A/B Router is not yet available.
